name: Archura's life
description:
The enemy final boss is your   The embodiment of his hunger for love. You cannot win against your emotions. You can only  resist against  emotions.  you must fight against the Final boss until you die. Becuse of you are in to the Unlimitless  emotional abyss

Esc -is paused the Game

E -activates the boss Altar

V-Attack

Space-jump

You should break The crystal's for Kill the Bosses.

This Game Created by me Only music are not maked by me
